[NEW] REVOSA Vest Top

@cmdr_nova@sharkey.mkultra.monster
05 Oct 2015

A simple system layer/Maitreya applier vest top to go with your darker lifestyle, or such and such.

Top comes with the usual system layer shirt, an applier exclusive to Maitreya and a free energy drink!

Next up on my list, I think, are more tattoos. Speaking of which, I am open to commission for custom tattoos! Just find me at my store, or the call box beneath the tattoo wall and give me a shout! My prices are reasonable, and I’m sure I can do whatever it is that you want.

[Updated] REVOSA Dexter Cami

@cmdr_nova@sharkey.mkultra.monster
04 Oct 2015

After finishing the last two products that I made today, I remembered that I had an old system layer camisole on my marketplace store, something I’d made way, way back when I started REVOSA (6 months ago).

So with my current ability, I took that cami and updated it with a Maitreya applier HUD, and now it is once again a viable purchase! (lol)

I think this may be the last old product that I update, although there was one other shirt, which was my very first product, before I even had a Second Life business… but we’ll see about that.

Inworld store: http://maps.secondlife.com/secondlife/Pisces/172/239/29

REVOSA Ice Truck Killer Polish

@cmdr_nova@sharkey.mkultra.monster
04 Oct 2015

Also released today, a special kind of nail polish. Is this good for Halloween? Probably.

Not so good if you’re an amputee, or the mother of a serial killer!

Ice Truck Killer nail polish package comes with Maitreya applier HUD, notecard and a free energy drink as always.

Being a giant fan of Dexter, this was a pleasure to make, and won’t be the last I do either!

REVOSA Loveless and Winged Skull Combo Tat! (Maitreya)

@cmdr_nova@sharkey.mkultra.monster
03 Oct 2015

Also now you can buy both of my previous tattoos in one applier and on one layer!

Not only is this the cheapest deal, if you of course want to wear both, but also removes the hassle of masking and mixing layers!

Next up I will likely do leg tattoos, or maybe even a butt today (lol).

As soon as TMP responds to my request, I’ll also being doing what I called “bloody frosted” lipstick. But, you know, it’s a waiting game.

[NEW] REVOSA Winged Skull Chest Tattoo!

@cmdr_nova@sharkey.mkultra.monster
03 Oct 2015

New today, the REVOSA Winged Skull Chest tattoo! Perfect for those who enjoy the darker side of life, or feel as though they’re constantly balancing good and evil! But that’s subjective anyway, right?

Included in the pack is a classic tattoo layer and a Maitreya applier HUD.

Next on my list is to make this chest tattoo and the recent sleeves that I did combined, so that you don’t have to fiddle with multiple layers and masking issues on your avatar. Enjoy!
